thread.title: Ground News - King Charles III awards metro employee: 'He saved 29 people'
thread.title_full: Ground News - King Charles III awards metro employee: 'He saved 29 people'

author: quotidiano.net
title: Ground News - King Charles III awards metro employee: 'He saved 29 people'
text:
Summary by quotidiano.net Rizwan Javed, 33, (in the photo), assistant to Elizabeth Line, received the year-end award, awarded by King Charles III, which awards in Great Britain those who have distinguished themselves in the world of politics, culture, sport and activism. Javed is worthy of having saved 29 people from suicide in London Underground stations. Among the winners are director Ridley Scott, actress Emilia Clarke, bestselling writer Jilly Cooper. But also Christ… Share menu More
